title: Nidalee FPS drop
body:
Running quadcore 4.37 ghz  with too 6970's in Xfire.. I get 280fps on high settings all the time drops to 245 in team fights on uncapped.
WHEN I WOULD GET GANKED BY NIDALEE IN MIDLANE AS RYZE!!! I would drop to 60 fps. Some of my teammates who got 100 fps were dropping to 15.
LOL I would know when i was about to be ganked because my FPS would drop lmao. Please fix its annoying as hell.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Is this occurring with Challenger Nidalee in your case? We're aware of an issue with Challenger Nidalee causing some issues with FPS and are working to get it resolved ASAP.
Honestly I do not remember! I want to say it was a green or red skin for her I neglected to check back. Glad to see you guys are working on it.
